oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cloud computing over light-trail WDM core networks
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GOKHALE, P
DAS, T
GUMASTE, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Light-trail, a spatial sub-wavelength optical grooming solution for WDM networks, facilitates dynamic bandwidth provisioning and optical multicasting - essential for cloud computing services. We evaluate through simulations a novel protocol for cloud computing over light-trails. (c) 2010 Optical Society of America.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 2010 CONFERENCE ON OPTICAL FIBER COMMUNICATION OFC COLLOCATED NATIONAL FIBER OPTIC ENGINEERS CONFERENCE OFC-NFOEC,-
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Conference on Optital Fiber Communication (OFC)/Collocated National Fiber Optic Engineers (NFOEC),San Diego, CA,JUN 21-25, 2010
